description: Complete system overview documenting the automotive lead management architecture, key components, and their interactions
Detailed documentation of lead data structures, ADF XML schema, vehicle data models, and their relationships with dealer CRM systems
Comprehensive documentation of the lead generation workflow, routing logic, and notification system integration with detailed sequence diagrams
Technical specification of the ADF XML generation process, including required fields, formatting rules, and dealer-specific customizations
Documentation of lead tracking analytics implementation, including performance metrics calculations and data aggregation methods
